articles.title: Who does Allegri support? Inter or Juventus? Here is the coach's blunt answer
articles.summary:
Mister Massimiliano Allegri spoke to DAZN at the end of Pisa-Milan 1-2.

Is it better for Juventus or Inter to lose points tomorrow?

“The important thing is that we scored 3 points.
